title: Ticket #95: SHADOW_STANDARD not in default SHADOW_LIST
description: In the schedd’s ShadowMgr class, if SHADOW_LIST isn’t defined in the config file, it uses a default list that excludes SHADOW_STANDARD.
check_ins: 2010-Mar-17 15:37   Check-in [17651]: Fix default value for SHADOW_LIST in schedd. #95 The only shadows we define are SHADOW and SHADOW_STANDARD, as reflected in the standard config file. Fix the default to be the same. SHADOW_LIST is undocumented, so no version history entry. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
